full_summary:
=====================================

**Government Tender Announcement**
=====================================

**Title:** Large-Scale Design Research Studies
=====================================

**Reference Number:** cb-877-37068879
-------------------------------------

**Publication Date:** November 5, 2024
---------------------------

**Tender Closing Date:** December 2, 2024, at 2:00 PM Eastern Time
----------------------------------------

### Background and Context

The Privy Council Office invites interested parties to participate in a tender process for large-scale design research studies.

### Key Facts

* **Request for Proposal (RFP)**: The solicitation is issued as a Request for Proposal under the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA).
* **Trade Agreements**: The contract is subject to the complementary sanctions regime of the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA).
* **UNSPC Codes**: Market research (*80141500*) and polling and survey, public opinion monitoring and analysis (*80171501*) are the related UN/CEFACT Standard Products and Service Code (UNSPC) categories.

### Work Description

The contractor is expected to provide support for the conduct of large-scale design research studies, including providing data collection tools as required. The scope of work may vary as per international best practice specifications.

### Required Skills and Deliverables

Parties interested in submitting a proposal must provide evidence of their expertise in market research studies, polling, and survey, public opinion monitoring and analysis. The full scope of the project shall be as described in the RFP document.

### Tender Evaluation

The evaluation will consider the best Combined rating for Technical Merit and Price.

### Contact Information

If you have questions about this tender, please contact:
Petar Radovic (petar.radovic@pco-bcp.gc.ca, 613-408-0251) at 85 Sparks Street, Ottawa, ON K1A 0A3.

### Accessing Tender Documents

You can access the tender documents as follows: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/50778/ddp_20241276_0.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/50778/ddp_20241276_0.pdf). Please note that only electronic documents are accepted. You are also required to provide your business registration details as part of the proposal submission requirements.
